Subject: “Correspondence with Govt./Ministries. AAI Hars, BCAS.
Hars, etc.: Req :

Of late, several instances have come to the notice f this Hqrs
wherein DisG/CASOs are directly entertaining and entering into
correspondence with Govt, AAI Hqrs, BCAS Hrs, etc., on their own
without prior approval from this HQrs/Force Directorate. This is not
desirable and is clearly in violation with established norms of the Force.

Considering the fact that an incorrect/unsuitable reply may put us
in an awkward/embarrassing position, it is directed that henceforth
DisG(APYCASOs_ should not directly entertain/respond to any
Correspondence from Govt. depts.; AAI HQrs, BCAS HQrs, etc. On
receipt of such communication, the same may be forwarded to this HOrs
with their considered comments.on the matter for further! necessary
action. DisG(APY/CASOs may only directly deal with local issues
pertaining to their zone/unit with the REDs, Dy COS (CA), ‘etc. under
intimation to this Hrs, ‘

Please acknowledge the receipt and ensure strict compliance.
